headline: KeyBanc Downgrades EOG Resources (EOG) to Sector Weight, RBC Capital Lowers PT
summary: EOG Resources, Inc. (NYSE:EOG) is one of the 12 Best American Energy Stocks to Buy Now. On January 16, KeyBanc downgraded its rating on EOG Resources, Inc. (NYSE:EOG) from Overweight to Sector Weight. KeyBanc pointed to worries about “clear signs of degradation” in both the Eagle Ford and Delaware Basin assets, along with a major […]
